Class-Champion 20 -- Female Half-Elf Champion: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 19 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Pharasma (N)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Celestial Form: Has a 25' fly Speed
Features/Skills

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feat (Choose 5 from any)
Celestial Form: Has the Darkvision feature
Champion Feats: Class Feat (Choose 11 from any)
Champion Key Ability: 1 selection
Champion's Code: 1 selection
Champion's Reaction: Can use the Champion's Reaction for the chosen champion cause
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Deity And Cause: Has the Anathema feature/1 selection
Divine Ally: 2 selections
General Feats: General Feat (Choose 5 from any)
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Liberator: Has the Liberating Step feature
Paladin: Has the Retributive Strike feature
Redeemer: Has the Glimpse Of Redemption feature
Second Ally: +1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 10 from any)
Adopted Ancestry (Halfling): Can take Halfling ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by Pharasma
Auspicious Mount: Mount is a specialized animal companion with Pharasma's mark, expert proficiency in Religion, speech, +2 Intelligence, and +1 Wisdom
Celestial Mount: Mount has Darkvision, +40 Hit Points, and weakness 10 to evil damage and can fly at full Speed
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Dragonslayer Oath: Must attempt to slay evil dragons whenever possible
Fiendsbane Oath: Must attempt to banish or slay fiends whenever possible
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and can take elf and half-elf feats
Imposing Destrier: Mount is a nimble or savage animal companion and can Stride or Strike without a command
Liberator: Must respect others' freedom and oppose tyranny
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Loyal Warhorse: Mount is mature and will never attack self
Paladin: Must always act with honor and respect lawful authority
Redeemer: Must always show compassion for others and attempt to redeem the wicked
Sense Evil: Can detect the presence of powerful evil auras (Deception vs. Perception negates)
Shining Oath: Must attempt to put undead to rest whenever possible
Steed Ally: Has a young animal companion for a mount
The Tenets Of Good: May not commit anathema or evil acts, harm innocents, or allow harm to come to innocents through inaction
Vengeful Oath: Must hunt down and exterminate creatures who have committed atrocities whenever possible
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Absalom Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Diplomacy: +24 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +24 (dexterity; untrained) Fishing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +24 (charisma; untrained)
Arcana: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Forest Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Architecture Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Games Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) River Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Art Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Guild Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Astral Plane Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Herbalism Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Society: +24 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +24 (strength; untrained) Intimidation: +26 (charisma; trained) Stabling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Baking Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Magnimar Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Cooking Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +26 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Midwifery Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +24 (charisma; untrained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Desert Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Gnomish; Goblin; Orcish; Shadowtongue
Skill Notes:
Alertness: Perception Expert
Champion Skills: Skill Trained (Religion; Choose 6 from any)
Deity And Cause: Skill Trained (Medicine)
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Absalom Lore): Skill Trained (Absalom Lore)
Skill Training (Baking Lore): Skill Trained (Baking Lore)
Skill Training (Games Lore): Skill Trained (Games Lore)
Skill Training (Herbalism Lore): Skill Trained (Herbalism Lore)
Skill Training (Magnimar Lore): Skill Trained (Magnimar Lore)
Skill Training (Milling Lore): Skill Trained (Milling Lore)
Skill Training (Occultism): Skill Trained (Occultism)
Skill Training (Survival): Skill Trained (Survival)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Absalom Lore): Can take an automatic 34 on Absalom Lore checks
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 4 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 43 (dexterity (1 max); legendary) Class DC: Champion: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 7; HP 40) Weapons: Dagger (+30 1d6+4 P/S R10'; strength; master); Morningstar (+30 1d6+4 B/P; strength; master); Sling (+30 1d6+2 B R50'; dexterity; master)
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Aura Of Vengeance: Reduces allies' penalty on Strikes in response to Retributive Strike to -2
Champion Expertise: Class Expert (Champion)
Champion Mastery: Class Master (Champion)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Deific Weapon: Dagger inflicts +1 damage die step
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Legendary Armor: Defense Legendary (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Radiant Blade Master: Has increased Blade Ally effects
Radiant Blade Spirit: Has increased Blade Ally effects
Shield Ally: +2 Shield Hardness/+50% Shield Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Aura Of Faith: R15' All self Strikes and the first Strike of each ally each rd inflict +1 HP good damage vs. evil creatures
Blade Ally: Can apply a choice of dancing, greater disrupting, keen, flaming, anarchic, axiomatic, holy, unholy, disrupting, ghost touch, returning, or shifting to a chosen weapon during daily prep, and critical hits inflict its critical specialization effect
Blade Of Justice: (2) Adds 2 extra damage dice to a Strike vs. an evil foe seen harming an innocent or ally and allows converting all damage to good, as well as inflicting Retributive Strike effects
Divine Reflexes: Can use an additional reaction for Champion's Reaction once per turn
Divine Smite (Liberator): Liberating Step inflicts 4 HP persistent good damage on a foe who restrains an ally
Divine Smite (Paladin): Retributive Strike inflicts 4 HP persistent good damage
Divine Smite (Redeemer): Glimpse Of Redemption inflicts 4 HP persistent good damage on a target who responds with damage
Divine Wall: Adjacent spaces are difficult terrain for foes
Dragonslayer Oath: Retributive Strike inflicts +4 HP damage, or +6 HP with master proficiency, when used vs. an evil dragon
Exalt (Liberator): R15' Liberating Step allows all allies to Step if the target ally does not attempt to break free
Exalt (Paladin): R15' Retributive Strike allows allies to use a reaction to make a -2 melee Strike against the target
Exalt (Redeemer): R15' Can use Glimpse Of Redemption to give allies resistance 20 to all damage
Fiendsbane Oath: Retributive Strike inflicts +4 HP damage, or +6 HP with master proficiency, when used vs. a fiend
Glimpse Of Redemption: (R) R15' Forces a foe who has damaged an ally to choose between negating the damage or giving the ally resistance 22 to all damage and suffering enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn
Instrument Of Zeal: Critical hit with Blade Of Justice or Retributive Strike inflicts +1 damage die and slowed 1 on the target's next turn
Lasting Doubt: Extends the effects of Glimpse Of Redemption at half intensity for 1 min
Liberating Step: (R) R15' Gives an ally resistance 22 to any triggering damage and free actions to Escape or to save from a restraint and to Step
Liberating Stride: Target of Liberating Step can Stride half their Speed
Quick Shield Block: Can use an additional reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Ranged Reprisal: Can make a Retributive Strike using a ranged Strike or a Step and a melee Strike
Retributive Strike: (R) R15' Gives an ally damaged by an attack resistance 22 to all damage and allows self to make a melee Strike against the attacking foe if within reach
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Shield Of Grace: Can redirect half of the excess damage to self when using Shield Block to protect an ally
Shield Of Reckoning: (R) Uses Shield Block on an ally and Champion's Reaction on the attacking foe
Shield Paragon: Shield is always raised and is automatically remade after 1 day if destroyed
Shield Warden: Can use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shining Oath: Retributive Strike inflicts +4 HP damage, or +6 HP with master proficiency, when used vs. undead
Smite Evil: (1) Blade ally inflicts +4 HP good, or +6 HP with master proficiency, vs. a chosen target for 1 rd, extended as long as the target attacks an ally
Unimpeded Step: Liberating Step target can Step normally in any terrain
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Weight Of Guilt: Glimpse Of Redemption can inflict stupefied instead of enfeebled
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Divine Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Aura Of Courage: R15' Reduces the initial value of any self frightened condition by 1, and reduction of a frightened condition at the end of a turn also reduces the fright of allies
Aura Of Life: R15' Gives resistance 5 to negative energy and +1 saves vs. necromancy
Aura Of Righteousness: R15' Gives resistance 5 to evil
Divine Grace: (R) Gives +2 vs. the triggering spell
Divine Health: +1 vs. disease, and successes vs. disease are critical successes
Divine Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Wyrmbane Aura: R15' Gives self and allies resistance 4 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison, or resistance 10 if the damage comes from dragon breath
Magic
Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane Innate: +26 (charisma; trained); Divine: +30 (charisma; master) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 36 (charisma; trained); Divine: 40 (charisma; master)
Spells:
Champion's Sacrifice (D6 Foc Abj): (R) R30' Redirects the damage of the triggering Strike or failed save from an ally to self
Charm (A1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Hero's Defiance (D10 Foc Nec): (F) Self recovers 10d4+20 Hit Points before suffering damage that would have reduced Hit Points to 0 once per Refocus
Lay On Hands (D1 Foc Nec): (1) Touched regains 6 HP and, if the target is not self, gains +2 Armor Class for 1 rd; touched undead instead suffers 1d6 HP positive and -2 Armor Class for 1 rd (save basic Fortitude also negates -2 Armor Class) (heightened +1 restores +6 HP or inflicts +1d6 HP)
Litany Against Sloth (D5 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers reaction prevention and slowed 1 for 1 rd (save Will reaction prevention only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2; slothful creatures worsen save by 1 degree)
Litany Against Wrath (D3 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers 3d6 HP good whenever it damages a good creature for 1 rd (save Will inflicts damage once; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 2; wrathful creatures worsen save by 1 degree)
Litany Of Righteousness (D7 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers weakness 7 to good for 1 rd (heightened +1 inflicts weakness +1)
Read Fate (D1 Foc Div): (1 min) R10' Successful DC 6 GM flat check gives a one-word clue to the target's short-term fate
Tempt Fate (D4 Foc Div): (R) R120' Gives the target +1 on the triggering save and turns a normal success into a critical success or a normal failure into a critical failure (heightened 8th gives +2 on the save)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Deity's Domain (Fate): Knows the Tempt Fate divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Affliction Mercy: Has increased Mercy effects
Champion Expertise: Spell Expert (Divine)
Champion Mastery: Spell Master (Divine)
Champion's Sacrifice: Knows the Champion's Sacrifice divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Deity's Domain (Fate): Knows the Read Fate divine spell
Devotion Spells: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Greater Mercy: Has increased Mercy effects
Hero's Defiance: Knows the Hero's Defiance divine spell
Liberator: Knows the Lay On Hands divine spell
Litany Against Sloth: Knows the Litany Against Sloth divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Litany Against Wrath: Knows the Litany Against Wrath divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Litany Of Righteousness: Knows the Litany Of Righteousness divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Paladin: Knows the Lay On Hands divine spell
Redeemer: Knows the Lay On Hands divine spell
Supernatural Charm: Knows the Charm arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st level once per day
Anchoring Aura: R15' Aura attempts to counteract teleportation spells cast by fiends
Devoted Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Heal Mount: Lay On Hands cast on mount restores 10 HP + 10 HP per heightened level
Incredible Investiture: Can invest 12 magic items
Mercy: (1) Subsequent Lay On Hands can also attempt to counteract a curse, disease, poison, blinded, deafened, sickened, slowed, fear or paralysis
Ultimate Mercy: Mercy can restore life with 1 Hit Point and wounded 1 to a target who died in the previous rd
Vengeful Oath: Can use Lay On Hands to inflict good damage on creatures seen harming innocents or good allies
Notes
Validation Errors:
Champion Cause Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
Champion Divine Ally Allocation: 2 available vs. 3 allocated
Champion-Liberator Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral Good) == 'Chaotic Good' and champion level (currently 20)
Champion-Paladin Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral Good) == 'Lawful Good' and champion level (currently 20)
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 50 allocated
